channel.title: Forcedchat + emote
channel.description:
i am trying to add a command, that if you do ::dance it will make everyone do the dance emote but how do i do c.forcedchat("message") for everyone and the emote with the forcedchat message?
please help :)

item.title: Forcedchat + emote
item.dc:creator: @usmanm786 usmanm786
item.description:
@usmanm786 wrote:

i am trying to add a command, that if you do ::dance it will make everyone do the dance emote but how do i do c.forcedchat(“message”) for everyone and the emote with the forcedchat message?

please help
